name: UNRWA (United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Near East)
description: Provides assistance, education, healthcare, and social services to Palestinian refugees.

name: MAP (Medical Aid for Palestinians)
description: Offers medical and healthcare support to Palestinians in the Middle East.

name: PCRF (Palestine Children's Relief Fund)
description: Provides medical care, surgeries, and humanitarian aid to Palestinian children in need.

name: ANERA (American Near East Refugee Aid)
description: Supports Palestinian refugees and vulnerable communities with humanitarian and development programs.

name: The Palestine Red Crescent Society
description: Delivers healthcare and emergency services to Palestinians in the West Bank, Gaza, and beyond.

name: Middle East Children's Alliance (MECA)
description: Supports Palestinian children and families with education, healthcare, and relief programs.

name: Al-Mezan Center for Human Rights
description: Advocates for human rights and provides legal aid to Palestinians in Gaza.

name: PCDCR (Palestinian Center for Democracy and Conflict Resolution)
description: Works on child protection, youth empowerment, and community development in Palestine.

name: Adalah - The Legal Center for Arab Minority Rights in Israel
description: Advocates for the rights of Palestinian citizens of Israel through legal action and advocacy.

name: Tamer Institute for Community Education
description: Focuses on education and literacy programs for Palestinian children and youth.

name: UNICEF State of Palestine
description: Supports the well-being and rights of Palestinian children through various programs and initiatives.

name: Defense for Children International - Palestine
description: Promotes and protects the rights of Palestinian children through advocacy and legal efforts.

name: Palestine Aid Society
description: Provides humanitarian aid, education, and healthcare support to Palestinians in need.

name: Hope Flowers School
description: Focuses on education and peace-building efforts in the West Bank.
